section.name: Beigesoft™ EIS, start after scratch.
section.p: In real life a user usually start to use an accounting software when it already has been doing its business. Assume that Bob started using Beigesoft™ EIS on 21 Jan 2016 with the same (as describing in previous articles) accounting results. He has been using single entry accounting software, he just write records in a spreadsheet. So results are:

As you can see, only Rob's wage and taxes are liabilities and Bob's income tax expenses at the same time, i.e. they should be recorded as symmetric double entries. All others are recorded as single asymmetric entries. To record beginning Inventory you should use the document Item adding.
